title: The Heist

[[image https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/5/5d/Night_House_in_the_Fog.jpg]]

------

Mildly eerie, contra expectations, is the house of a wicked man! 

[[tabview]]
[[tab Tiny Creations]]
Handcrafted products before the Spanish took me.

**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/crooked-kingdom|Crooked Kingdom]]]** (##green|+30##)
//For love is the desire of the whole, and the pursuit of the whole is called love.//

//Sometimes that whole is lessened.//

**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/ulla-na-folla|Ùlla Na Folla]]]** (##green|+52##) (once) Featured!
//Worlds die and fade to the night’s embrace. Others survive a little more. And back home, a man and his cat watch as a Sumerian warrior from ages forgotten engages in some real Resident Evil.//
[[/tab]]
[[tab Megabuilds]]
For some, the moon, as a constant sight, can prove brighter than the Sun.
 
**[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/nightfall-hub|NIGHTFALL Hub]]]** (##red|+117##)
[[/tab]]
[[/tabview]]
